name: Microwave Samsung GE83KRW-1/BW (GE83KRW-1/BW)
origAbout: Soft-1 Microwave oven with grill, BIO-Ceramic Coating, 23 l - 99.9% protection against bacteria, increased internal volume with compact dimensions, intuitive control panel. The bio ceramic coating prevents bacteria growth and is scratch resistant. The camera cover looks new even after long use. The unique Triple Distribution System warms food evenly from pizza to glass of milk.
